thumb.name: The Coolest Friend Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EBecky.%3Cbr%3EOf all the friends%3Cbr%3E in the world...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EYou're definitely the coolest!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Always an Adventure! Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EStay Tuned.%3Cbr%3E Alex...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...for more exciting adventures%3Cbr%3Eof the Alex and Morgan show!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBeing friends with you%3Cbr%3Eis always an adventure!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: You're Special
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EThinking%3Cbr%3Eof%3Cbr%3Eyou.%3Cbr%3EKelly...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E ...and remembering%3Cbr%3Eall the things you do%3Cbr%3Ethat make you%3Cbr%3Esomeone special%3Cbr%3Ein my life.

thumb.name: A Blessing Few Receive Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor Pat%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFriends are%3Cbr%3Ea wonderful reflection%3Cbr%3Eof God's special love.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA friend loves at all times...%3Cbr%3EProverbs 17:17%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI've often thought that having%3Cbr%3ESuch a special friend as you%3Cbr%3EIs certainly a blessing%3Cbr%3EThat is granted very few...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThat's why so very many times.%3Cbr%3EMy thoughts become a prayer%3Cbr%3EThat God will always keep you%3Cbr%3EIn His kind and loving care.%3Cbr%3E
